speaker: agent
text: Tech Support, this is Sarah. How can I help?

speaker: client
text: My internet is down again. It's been out for 2 hours.

speaker: agent
text: I'm sorry to hear that. let me check your line... Ah, I see a signal issue. I'll reset your connection from here.

speaker: client
text: Okay, waiting.

speaker: agent
text: Reset complete. Please restart your router.

speaker: client
text: It's working now! Thanks Sarah.

speaker: agent
text: You're welcome. Have a great day!

speaker: agent
text: Billing department, Alex speaking.

speaker: client
text: You charged me double this month! I want a refund immediately.

speaker: agent
text: Sir, looking at the logs, you made international calls. Those are not covered.

speaker: client
text: I never made those calls! This is fraud. I'm cancelling my service.

speaker: agent
text: That is your choice. The charges stand.

speaker: client
text: I'm reporting this to the consumer forum. Goodbye.

speaker: agent
text: Hello, Amazon support.

speaker: client
text: My package was marked delivered but I didn't receive it.

speaker: agent
text: Let me track that for you... It says left at front porch.

speaker: client
text: I checked everywhere, it's not there.

speaker: agent
text: I understand. Since you can't find it, I will issue a full replacement shipment right away. It should arrive tomorrow.

speaker: client
text: Oh thank goodness. That's a relief. Thank you.

speaker: agent
text: Support, how can I help?

speaker: client
text: I need to change my password.

speaker: agent
text: You can do that by going to Settings > Security > Change Password.

speaker: client
text: Okay, I see the menu options.
